staff at scooter's coffee, omaha, were locked out of their facebook page for 24 hours after an employee clicked on a malicious link in an email. the company's facebook page was hacked at 5pm sunday by an 'unknown third party'   the page was flooded with images of adult cartoons and links to adult websites. the images were similar to those posted on delta air lines and crayola's pages after they were hacked. facebook has since removed the content and apologized to the company.

adam mcburney has been capped for the ireland under-20s and was not at his home in county antrim, northern ireland. gunman fired multiple bullets through the windows of his property in the early hours of easter sunday. bullets tore through windows and embedded in kitchen and bathroom walls of the property. neighbours said he could have been killed if he was in the house at the time of the attack. police are appealing for witnesses and said the incident had 'criminal elements'

dove asked a group of women to write down every thought they had about themselves in a notebook. the women were then asked to create a script. two undercover actresses read the script out loud to two other women in a cafe. the one beautiful thought ad campaign shows the harsh criticism women heap on themselves.

christian benteke scored a hat-trick as aston villa drew 3-3 against queens park rangers. the striker scored a stunning treble in the premier league draw at villa park. tim sherwood said that bentekes can fire villa to safety from the drop zone.

sri lanka is one of the best places in the world to visit in 2015. gareth huw davies picks five things to see on the teardrop-shaped island. the island is the spiritual home of serendipity. the jumbo jumbo and rock of ages are among the island's most popular attractions.

alastair cook badly needing runs and wins in the last two tests of the series for england. peter moores has been forced to defend his captain after his failure in the first test. cook failed in both innings of the 1st test against west indies in grenada.

janet muller's body was found in the boot of a burning car on march 13 in ifield, west sussex. the 21-year-old was reported missing from hospital the day before her death. she was last seen walking in a subway in portslade on march 12 at 10.30pm. police have released video stills and footage of the university of brighton student the night before. christopher jeffrey-shaw, 26, has been charged with her murder.

sean jefferson, 45, and elizabeth jowitt, 37, decorated their york flat with items from graves. the items included wreaths, lanterns, memorial slates and homemade gifts. some of the items were taken from the graves of babies and grandmothers. the couple admitted handling stolen goods at york magistrates' court and were banned from cemeteries indefinitely. they were discovered after a relative of one of the victims noticed a wreath was missing.
